short.ar: جرب إثارة نقل الركاب في المدينة مع سائق الحافلة المدقع.
short.am: ከባድ የአውቶቡስ ሹፌር ይዘው በከተማ ውስጥ ተሳፋሪዎችን ማጓጓዝ ምን ያህል አስደሳች እንደሆነ ተመልከቱ።
short.bg: Насладете се на тръпката от транспортирането на пътници в града с екстремен шофьор на автобус.
short.bn: চরম বাস ড্রাইভারের সাথে শহরে যাত্রী পরিবহনের রোমাঞ্চ অনুভব করুন।
short.ca: Viu l'emoció de transportar passatgers a la ciutat amb un conductor d'autobús extrem.
short.cs: Zažijte vzrušení z přepravy cestujících ve městě s extrémním řidičem autobusu.
short.da: Oplev spændingen ved at transportere passagerer i byen med ekstrem buschauffør.
short.de: Erleben Sie den Nervenkitzel der Beförderung von Passagieren in der Stadt mit einem extremen Busfahrer.
short.el: Ζήστε τη συγκίνηση της μεταφοράς επιβατών στην πόλη με ακραίο οδηγό λεωφορείου.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,pt_BR,pt_: Experience the thrill of transporting passengers in city with extreme bus driver.
short.es: Experimente la emoción de transportar pasajeros en la ciudad con un conductor de autobús extremo.
short.et: Kogege ekstreemse bussijuhiga linnas reisijate vedamise põnevust.
short.fa: هیجان حمل و نقل مسافر در شهر را با راننده اتوبوس شدید تجربه کنید.
short.fi: Koe matkustajien kuljettamisen jännitys kaupungissa äärimmäisen bussinkuljettajan kanssa.
short.fil: Maranasan ang thrill ng paghahatid ng mga pasahero sa lungsod na may matinding driver ng bus.
short.fr: Découvrez le frisson du transport de passagers en ville avec un chauffeur de bus extrême.
short.gu: આત્યંતિક બસ ડ્રાઇવર સાથે શહેરમાં મુસાફરોને પરિવહન કરવાના રોમાંચનો અનુભવ કરો.
short.he: לחוות את הריגוש של הסעת נוסעים בעיר עם נהג אוטובוס קיצוני.
short.hi: अत्यधिक बस चालक के साथ शहर में यात्रियों को परिवहन करने के रोमांच का अनुभव करें।
short.hr: Doživite uzbuđenje prijevoza putnika u gradu s ekstremnim vozačem autobusa.
short.hu: Tapasztalja meg az utasok városi szállításának izgalmát extrém buszsofőrrel.
short.id: Rasakan sensasi mengangkut penumpang di kota dengan sopir bus ekstrem.
short.it: Prova l'emozione di trasportare passeggeri in città con l'autista di autobus estremo.
short.ja: 極端なバスの運転手で市内で乗客を輸送するスリルを体験してください。
short.kn: ವಿಪರೀತ ಬಸ್ ಚಾಲಕನೊಂದಿಗೆ ನಗರದಲ್ಲಿ ಪ್ರಯಾಣಿಕರನ್ನು ಸಾಗಿಸುವ ರೋಮಾಂಚನವನ್ನು ಅನುಭವಿಸಿ.
short.ko: 극한의 버스 운전사와 함께 도시에서 승객을 수송하는 스릴을 경험하십시오.
short.lv: Izbaudiet aizraušanos, pārvadājot pasažierus pilsētā ar ekstrēmu autobusa vadītāju.
short.ml: തീവ്രമായ ബസ് ഡ്രൈവറോടൊപ്പം നഗരത്തിൽ യാത്രക്കാരെ കൊണ്ടുപോകുന്നതിന്റെ ആവേശം അനുഭവിക്കുക.
short.mr: टोकाच्या बस ड्रायव्हरसह शहरातील प्रवासी वाहतुकीचा थरार अनुभवा.
short.ms: Alami keseronokan mengangkut penumpang di bandar dengan pemandu bas yang melampau.
short.nl: Ervaar de sensatie van het vervoeren van passagiers in de stad met extreme buschauffeur.
short.no: Opplev spenningen ved å transportere passasjerer i byen med ekstrem bussjåfør.
short.pl: Przeżyj dreszczyk emocji podczas transportu pasażerów w mieście z ekstremalnym kierowcą autobusu.
short.ro: Experimentați emoția de a transporta pasageri în oraș cu șoferul de autobuz extrem.
short.ru: Испытайте острые ощущения от перевозки пассажиров по городу с водителем-экстримом.
short.sk: Zažite vzrušenie z prepravy cestujúcich v meste s extrémnym vodičom autobusu.
short.sl: Doživite vznemirjenje prevoza potnikov v mestu z ekstremnim voznikom avtobusa.
short.sv: Upplev spänningen att transportera passagerare i staden med extrem busschaufför.
short.sw: Uzoefu msisimko wa kusafirisha abiria katika mji na dereva wa basi uliokithiri.
short.ta: தீவிர பேருந்து ஓட்டுநருடன் நகரத்தில் பயணிகளை கொண்டு செல்லும் சிலிர்ப்பை அனுபவியுங்கள்.
short.te: విపరీతమైన బస్సు డ్రైవర్ తో నగరంలో ప్రయాణీకులను రవాణా చేసే థ్రిల్ ను అనుభవించండి.
short.th: สัมผัสความตื่นเต้นของการขนส่งผู้โดยสารในเมืองกับคนขับรถบัสสุดขั้ว
short.tr: Ekstrem otobüs şoförü ile şehirde yolcu taşımanın heyecanını yaşayın.
short.uk: Відчуйте гострі відчуття від перевезення пасажирів у місті з екстремальним водієм автобуса.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In a world where realistic graphics and three-dimensional design meet, join the most fun journey of the bus simulator genre with Extreme Bus Driver. Pick up passengers from bus stops in the city, race against time, and show off your skills by delivering them to destinations.

The game's main aim is to take the passengers waiting at the bus stops and transport them safely to the next bus stop within the specified time. While keeping an eye on the traffic, you will need to skillfully maneuver through the city streets to ensure the safety of your passengers and deliver on time.

Each successful mission is rewarded with rewards. Thanks to these rewards, you can customize your bus. You can change the color of the bus, optimize the suspension settings, adjust the camber angle, and change the spoiler. These customization options offer the perfect opportunity to design your bus in your way and improve its performance.

It is found in reward packages hidden in the city. You can customize your bus by collecting rewards as you search for these packages in the city. You will have an unforgettable bus driving experience as you explore every street in the city.

Among the car games, this game offers a unique journey to bus simulator lovers. While driving your bus, you will be the master of the city streets, transport passengers safely and customize your bus with rewards. Step into a realistic bus driving experience with Extreme Bus Driver and be the best driver in the city.

How To Play
You can use WASD or arrow keys to move your vehicle. When you want to accelerate your vehicle in areas where necessary, you can activate the nitro by using the F key. By using the R key, you can make your vehicle come out from where it was stuck.

Extreme Bus Driver Car Game Features
✓ Realistic sounds
✓ 3D Graphics
✓ Realistic Environment
✓ Easy control

Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! Extreme Bus Driver Car Game extension does not contain any hidden ads.

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@gamebol.com and share your thoughts and problems.
